tns:patch.author: ociubotaru
tns:patch.description: Transform dates in amp_filter_data with format MM/dd/yyyy to dd/MM/yyyy

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Default Date Format';

update amp_filter_data set "value"=substring("value" from 4 for 2)||'/'||substring("value" from 1 for 2)||'/'||substring("value" from 7 for 4) where property_name in ( 'fromDate', 'toDate', 'fromActivityStartDate', 'toActivityStartDate', 'fromActivityActualCompletionDate', 'toActivityActualCompletionDate', 'fromActivityFinalContractingDate', 'toActivityFinalContractingDate', 'fromProposedApprovalDate', 'toProposedApprovalDate', 'fromEffectiveFundingDate', 'toEffectiveFundingDate', 'fromFundingClosingDate', 'toFundingClosingDate') and length("value")=10
